errorMessages.defaultDescription: An unexpected error occurred during the previous action. Please try again later.
errorMessages.httpDescription: A status {status} was received while communicating with {url}
errorMessages.httpQuotaExceed: This action is not possible because the quota has been exceeded. Please contact your administrator.
errorMessages.httpNotFound: The resource could not be found. Please try again.
errorMessages.httpInternalServerError: Server error. Please try again later.
errorMessages.httpBadGateway: Service unavailable. Please try again later.
errorMessages.httpDefault: Error while communicating with the server.

httpConflict.default: Cette action est impossible à cause d'un conflit. La ressource est utilisée.
